Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Speaker A and Speaker B plan to meet up during winter break, indicating a friendly and possibly developing relationship. 

Event Description:
Speaker A found a great new Chinese restaurant and brought his sons there, who love Chinese food. Speaker A's sons have been studying abroad and are leaving again soon. One of Speaker A's sons has a Spanish girlfriend and they are studying to be chefs. Speaker B's sons will have a surprise party for their thirteenth birthday. Speaker A and Speaker B might go ice skating together during winter break.
